TextLibrary.Text: Hope you enjoyed the mining, kid. I know I enjoyed the flight. You're a pretty decent pilot. No hard feelings?
Hope you enjoyed the mining, kid. I know I enjoyed the flight. You're a pretty decent pilot. No hard feelings?
Sure. And thanks for the mining gear.
Sure. And thanks for the mining gear.
Hey! Looks like we got a message from your pal, that other MRI guy.
Hey! Looks like we got a message from your pal, that other MRI guy.
Yeah - he's the one - it was pretty garbled though. The LeapGate techs seem to still be deciphering it, but they're having some trouble with the LeapGates today.
Yeah - he's the one - it was pretty garbled though. The LeapGate techs seem to still be deciphering it, but they're having some trouble with the LeapGates today.
